suppress.notes: WA-6234: Product false positive because DTD support is disabled for WstxInputFactory, see https://github.com/apache/chemistry-opencmis/blob/9e49c685af9044a64cde0ab111792d74e914f4f2/chemistry-opencmis-commons/chemistry-opencmis-commons-impl/src/main/java/org/apache/chemistry/opencmis/commons/impl/XMLUtils.java#L82
